name: Rawle Becerril
bio: Hey there! My name is Rawle Becerril and after nearly a decade in the music industry, I've decided to set my sights on a whole new challenge in the world of Software Development. I am a Full-Stack web developer with a penchant for learning new things and implementing creative solutions for today's problems. While I'm not coding, I enjoy cooking anything from smashburgers to Beef Wellington, and making and performing electronic music!
